Job Description:Job Title: Quantitative StrategistCorporate Title: VPLocation: Mumbai, IndiaRole DescriptionDeutsche CIB Centre Pvt Ltd is Deutsche bank’s global platform for front-office & aligned functions to create value by utilizing non-traditional locations, exceptional talent, and a collaborative culture.This branch of Deutsche Bank Group company is looking for extremely bright candidates for the role of Desk Strategic Analytics (Strats). The candidate is required to work in collaboration with FIC Asia Pacificteam on various quantitative and regulatory driven projects. Candidate is required to understand the business problem, gather information required for the implementation and provide an end-to-end optimized solution on a scalable platform. Implementation of the project needs to be done in Python and C++ programming language. Candidate should possess a very good English communication skill to coordinate and communicate his work effectively with various stakeholders spread across globe. Candidate needs to possess people skills and able to handle complex situation.What we’ll offer youAs part of our flexible scheme, here are just some of the benefits that you’ll enjoyBest in class leave policy
Gender neutral parental leaves
100% reimbursement under childcare assistance benefit (gender neutral)
Flexible working arrangements
Employee Assistance Program for you and your family members
Comprehensive Hospitalization Insurance for you and your dependents
Accident and Term life InsuranceYour key responsibilitiesCentralization and automation of end of the day pricing and risk calculation for Fixed Income business
Build quant driven tools and products for front-office and control functions
Work on implementation of regulatory driven projects like AQR (Asset Quality Review) for the Bank
Coordinate and gather information from various stakeholders for deeper understanding of the business
Design an automated solution which is optimized and scalable
Develop and design tables and databases required for the storage of the data
Develop application/libraries for the implementation of the solutionYour skills and experienceStrong educational background in Engineering/Science, preferably from good colleges in India
Total experience of 5 years and above in Financial Industry
Relevant experience and knowledge of various financial products – Bonds, Swaps, Cross Currency Swaps, Loans & Deposits
Knowledge of derivatives pricing and risk calculations of financial products
At least 3 years’ experience in Python programming
At least 3 years’ experience with relational database design (oracle, mysql)
Relevant experience in C++ programming (Class, Pointers, Data structure – stacks, queue)
Experience with applied econometrics (Hypothesis testing, PCA, Linear/Non-Linear Regression etc)
Knowledge of applied linear/Integer linear programming, dynamic programming & greedy algorithmsHow we’ll support youTraining and development to help you excel in your career
